name: MICHAEL: The Official Demo
description:
MICHAEL is a visual novel based around the 8th season of the American anthropology series, American Horror Story. You play as a resident of Outpost 3 after the apocalypse caused the end of the world. As the days pass by in a blur, you slowly start to gain information the leaders tried desperately to keep hidden. Will you sacrifice yourself for the sake of others or try to escape the boring life of one of the only safe places on earth?

Features:
-Choose your characters name!
-Make choices and bond with characters
-Experience the life of Outpost 3 for yourself
-4 planned endings

COMING SOON:
-Chapters 1-3
-Screenshot system

This game has not been authorised or endorsed by Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk or 20th Television. This is a fan creation and is NOT a legitimate part of the series, please do not treat it as such.
